com.backyardbrains.audio
Class AudioService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.backyardbrains.audio.AudioService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReceivesAudio
public class AudioService
extends Service
implements ReceivesAudio

Manages a thread which monitors default audio input and pushes raw audio data to bound activities.

Version:
1
Author:
Nathan Dotz

getAudioFromMicListener

public java.nio.ByteBuffer getAudioFromMicListener()
Deprecated. 

Called by bound activities (for now, just BackyardAndroidActivity ) to get audio data to hand off to a drawing surface

Returns:
ByteBuffer of audio data from MicListener

onUnbind

public boolean onUnbind(Intent intent)
make sure we clean up. shuts down MicListener thread and assures someone has told us to stop (in this case, ourselves)
